name: Florentine Eggs
author: MIDWESTCINCY
summary: A wonderful way to spruce up eggs using spinach, mushrooms, tomatoes, and mozzarella cheese.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 tablespoon sliced onion, or to taste
½ cup sliced baby bella mushrooms
½ cup fresh spinach, or to taste
2 tablespoons shredded mozzarella cheese, or to taste
2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste
directions: Beat eggs, milk, and a pinch of salt together in a bowl
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat; cook and stir onion and garlic until onion is softened, 5 to 10 minutes
Add mushrooms, spinach, and cherry tomatoes; cook and stir until spinach is wilted, 3 to 5 minutes
Pour egg mixture over vegetable mixture and cook until eggs are still soft and halfway cooked, 2 to 3 minutes
Add mozzarella cheese and Parmesan cheese to egg mixture; cook until eggs are set and cheeses are melted, 3 to 4 more minutes
